channel.title: I need help adding stuff in shop
channel.description:
well i want to add donator shop.. i got to config "shops" and find the shop donator shop when i try to change the items it wont work [code]shop = 22 Donator Shop 2 100 590 35 1755 667 2347 2402 550 746 5605 5 1351 10 303 10 1265 10 313 1000[/code]
please help. Thanks :D

item.title: I need help adding stuff in shop
item.dc:creator: @xlogga123 xlogga123
item.description:
@xlogga123 wrote:

[quote=“adecker, post:2, topic:322853”]Try seperating the numbers with commas!im pretty sure that “2 100 590 35 1755 667 2347 2402 550 746 5605 5 1351 10 303 10 1265 10 313 1000” isnt a item. The source is reading it like item # 210059035 etc etc.

Sperate them with ,

ehm well

Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount

Read full topic

item.title: I need help adding stuff in shop

item.description:
@xlogga123 wrote:

well i want to add donator shop…
i got to config “shops” and find the shop donator shop
when i try to change the items it wont work

shop = 22	Donator Shop				2	100	590	35	1755	667	2347	2402	550	746	5605	5	1351	10	303	10	1265	10	313	1000

please help. Thanks
